Detailed Description

Header file that exposes the public interface of BGP Stream Address objects.

Author
Chiara Orsini

Definition in file bgpstream_utils_addr.h.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define bgpstream_addr_ntop (   buf,
  len,
  bsaddr 
)
Value:
inet_ntop((bsaddr)->version, \
&(((bgpstream_ip_addr_t*)(bsaddr))->addr), \
buf, len)
struct_bgpstream_ip_addr_t
A generic BGP Stream IP address.
Definition: bgpstream_utils_addr.h:82

Write the string representation of the given IP address into the given character buffer.

Parameters
bufpointer to a character buffer at least len bytes long
lenlength of the given character buffer
bsaddrpointer to the bgpstream addr to convert to string

You will likely want to use INET_ADDRSTRLEN or INET6_ADDRSTRLEN to dimension the buffer.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct struct_bgpstream_addr_storage_t bgpstream_addr_storage_t

Generic storage for a BGP Stream IP address.

typedef struct struct_bgpstream_ip_addr_t bgpstream_ip_addr_t

A generic BGP Stream IP address.

Must only be used for casting to the appropriate type based on the version

typedef struct struct_bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t

An IPv4 BGP Stream IP address.

typedef struct struct_bgpstream_ipv6_addr_t bgpstream_ipv6_addr_t

An IPv6 BGP Stream IP address.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum bgpstream_addr_version_t

Version of a BGP Stream IP Address.

These share values with AF_INET and AF_INET6 so that the version field of a BGP Stream address can be used directly with standard address manipulation functions

Enumerator
BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_UNKNOWN 

Address type unknown.

BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV4 

Address type IPv4.

BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV6 

Address type IPv6.

Definition at line 55 of file bgpstream_utils_addr.h.

Function Documentation

int bgpstream_addr_storage_equal ( bgpstream_addr_storage_t *  addr1,
bgpstream_addr_storage_t *  ip2 
)

Compare two generic addresses for equality.

Parameters
addr1pointer to the first address to compare
addr2pointer to the second address to compare
Returns
0 if the addresses are not equal, non-zero if they are equal
